title: Patriots, Tom Brady-Aaron Rodgers, celebrations, Lakers, & where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: Patriots, Tom Brady-Aaron Rodgers, celebrations, Lakers, & where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin discusses why the New England Patriots system doesn't have a name, why NE Patriots QB Tom Brady is better than Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers, why the NFL allows TD celebrations, the rumors about Los Angeles Lakers HC Luke Walton, and where Colin was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Drew Bledsoe, Michael Vick, Chris Broussard, and Trent Dilfer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
